column3: Traffic;Sihanoukville: A taxi driver was detained by police after his Highlander rolled into a house and killed a man on March 5 2019 at 7.30 pm  in Village 2
column5: Preah Sihanouk Province.------Police in Sihanoukville said that the HIGHLANDER was driven by a man named as Ray
column7: a 47 year old  resident of village 4
column9: Sihanoukville province.------The car had brought passengers from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville
column10: and after dropping them at their destination
column11: the driver got out of the vehicle to buy something.------However
column12: he forgot to change the gear to PARK mode and left it in NEUTRAL. The car began to roll
column13: and hit two stall owners and a wall.------The first victim. Vorn Veasna
column20: 35 years old was seriously injured.------After the incident
column21: the injured woman was sent to Sihanoukville Referral Hospital
column22: while the body was handed over to the family.------ The driver was detained at the traffic police station and the vehicle was kept at the Traffic Police Office. ------http://www.phnompenhreporter.com/article/63732
